summary: Implements a Slack integration that formats and dispatches operational alerts and periodic status reports for the LiteLLM system. It processes various event types—such as service outages, performance issues, budget thresholds, deployment updates, and user/key actions—batching payloads, enriching them with contextual data, and sending them asynchronously to configured Slack webhooks or related channels.
business_intent: Enable automated, real‑time notification of system health, usage limits, and operational changes to stakeholders via Slack, facilitating rapid incident response, budget monitoring, and visibility into deployment and user activity.
